applies_to_part.desc: Filters for work belonging to any of the provided parts.

created_by.desc: Filters for work created by any of these users.

owned_by.desc: Filters for work owned by any of these users.

issue.rev_orgs.desc: Filters for issues with any of the provided Rev organizations

issue.priority.desc: Filters for issues with any of the provided priorities

limit.desc: The maximum number of works to return.

stage.name.desc: Filters for records in the provided stage(s) by name

ticket.needs_response.desc: Filters for tickets that need a response

ticket.severity.desc: Filters for tickets with any of the provided severities

ticket.source_channel.desc: Filters for tickets with any of the provided source channels

types.desc: Filters for work of the provided types.

objects.desc: A list of objects to be prioritized

work_ids.desc: A list of work item IDs to be added to the sprint.

sprint_id.desc: The ID of the sprint to which the work items should be added

work_id.desc: The ID of the work item for which you want to find similar items

query.desc: The search string, could be for example customer’s name, part name, user name.

text.desc: The text from which the actionable insights need to be created.
